title: Identify Key Components and Materials
description: Research and identify key components and advanced thermoelectric materials required for the waste heat recovery system.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop a system architecture that effectively captures waste heat and converts it into electricity.

title: Prototype System Design
description: Create a prototype design based on the system architecture to test its feasibility.

title: Perform Simulations and Analysis
description: Perform simulations and analysis to ensure the efficiency and effectiveness of the system design.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Write clear and concise technical documentation for the system design.

title: Review System Design Documentation
description: Review the technical documentation for accuracy and completeness.

title: Plan Manufacturing Processes
description: Develop a manufacturing plan for the system, including sourcing components and materials.

title: Test Prototype System
description: Test the prototype system to ensure it functions as expected.

title: Iterate on System Design
description: Make necessary revisions to the system design based on prototype testing results.

title: Finalize System Design and Documentation
description: Finalize the system design and documentation, incorporating any necessary revisions.

title: Prepare for Production
description: Prepare for the production of the final system based on the finalized design.
